ninja.leaping.configurate.commented

Interface CommentedConfigurationNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCommentedConfigurationNode

    public interface CommentedConfigurationNode
extends ConfigurationNode
    A configuration node that is capable of having an attached comment

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommentedConfigurationNode getAppendedNode() 
      List<? extends CommentedConfigurationNode> getChildrenList()

      Return an immutable copy of the mapping from key to node of every child this node is aware of

      Gets the current value for the comment.

      Gets the node at the given (relative) path, possibly traversing multiple levels of nodes

      Returns the current parent for this node.
      CommentedConfigurationNode mergeValuesFrom(ConfigurationNode other)
      Set all the values from the given node that are not present in this node to their values in the provided node.

      Sets the comment for this configuration.
      CommentedConfigurationNode setValue(Object value)

    • Method Detail

      • getComment

        Optional<String> getComment()
        Gets the current value for the comment. If the comment contains multiple lines, the lines will be split by \n
        Returns:
        the configuration's current comment

      • setComment

        CommentedConfigurationNode setComment(String comment)
        Sets the comment for this configuration.
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment to set. Line breaks should be represented as LFs (\n)
        Returns:
        this

      • mergeValuesFrom

        CommentedConfigurationNode mergeValuesFrom(ConfigurationNode other)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationNode
        Set all the values from the given node that are not present in this node to their values in the provided node. Map keys will be merged. Lists and scalar values will be replaced.
        Specified by:
        mergeValuesFrom in interface ConfigurationNode
        Parameters:
        other - The node to merge values from
        Returns:
        this

      • getAppendedNode

        CommentedConfigurationNode getAppendedNode()
        Specified by:
        getAppendedNode in interface ConfigurationNode
        Returns:
        a new child created as the next entry in the list when it is attached
